text: Also, in terms of visual design, I think that it would be good to have a colormap that fades to white (or transparent) rather than black, at least for white backgrounds. The current colormap does not convey the ideas that we are looking 'through' a brain. To someone glancing at the figures, it might look like a cut. We want to make it as visually different as possible from a cut.
